onset.Description: timepoint that stimulus appears on screen that matches scan timeseries

duration.Description: period of time during which stimulus was on screen
duration.Notes: This task was self-paced, so duration for trial_id == 'stim' correspond to response_time. Duration for trial_id == 'feedback' was 2.25 followed by variable length of blank screen (ITI).

EV.Description: expected value (gain amount * gain probability - loss amount * loss probability), demeaned within individual's session

action.Description: which action participant chose to take

clicked_on_loss_card.Description: whether or not participant clicked on a loss card at given choice action phase
clicked_on_loss_card.Notes: clicking on loss card ends round

gain_amount.Description: how much points you gain for each gain card you flip

gain_probability.Description: number of cards left that are gain cards / total number of cards left in deck

key_press.Notes: 89 was coded for index finger responses, 71 for middle finger responses

loss_amount.Description: how much points you lose for flipping a loss card

loss_probability.Description: number of cards left that are loss cards / total number of cards left in deck

num_cards.Description: total number of cards in deck

num_click_in_round.Description: count for action taken in trial

num_loss_cards.Description: total number of loss cards in deck

risk.Description: operation of level of risk at each choice calculated by: (gain_probability * (gain_amount-EV)**2 + loss_probability * (loss_amount-EV)**2)**.5, demeaned within individual's session

total_cards.Description: total number of cards flipped in trial
